\documentclass[10pt,a4paper]{article} 

\usepackage[absolute]{textpos} 
\usepackage[]{eso-pic}
\usepackage{fancybox}
\usepackage{calc}

\title{Herbarium}
\author{Author}


\begin{document}
\maketitle
\pagestyle{empty}
\raggedbottom
\newpage

%	lengths
\setlength{\TPHorizModule}{95mm} 
\setlength{\TPVertModule}{70mm}

\textblockorigin{12mm}{-30mm}
\setlength{\parindent}{10pt}

\newlength{\elude}
\newlength{\framewidth}
\newlength{\addspace}
\newlength{\boxwidth}
\newlength{\boxheight}

\setlength{\fboxrule}{1pt}
\setlength{\fboxsep}{10pt}
% adjust \textblockorigin and \put lower left, lower right, and bottom center
% according to the value of \addspace
\setlength{\addspace}{4mm}

\setlength{\framewidth}{0.75\fboxrule+1.5\fboxrule+1.5\fboxrule+0.5pt}
\setlength{\elude}{2\fboxsep+2\framewidth+\addspace}

\setlength{\boxwidth}{\TPVertModule -\elude}
\setlength{\boxheight}{\TPHorizModule -\elude-0.75\framewidth}


\AddToShipoutPicture{%
\setlength{\unitlength}{1mm}

%	upper left
\put(  0,292){{\line(1,0){10}}} % horizontal
\put( 10,292){{\line(0,1){ 5}}} % vertical

%	upper right
\put(200,292){{\line(1,0){10}}}
\put(200,292){{\line(0,1){ 5}}}

%	lower left
\put(  0, 13){{\line(1,0){10}}}
\put( 10,  0){{\line(0,1){13}}}

%	lower right
\put(200, 13){{\line(1,0){10}}}
\put(200,  0){{\line(0,1){13}}}

%	top center
\put(105,292){{\line(0,1){ 5}}}

%	bottom center
\put(105,  0){{\line(0,1){13}}}

%	first row
\put(  0,223){{\line(1,0){10}}}
\put(200,223){{\line(1,0){10}}}

%	second row
\put(  0,153){{\line(1,0){10}}}
\put(200,153){{\line(1,0){10}}}

%	third row
\put(  0, 83){{\line(1,0){10}}}
\put(200, 83){{\line(1,0){10}}}

}

\noindent

   	\begin{minipage}[c][\boxwidth][t]{\boxheight}
   	Text 
	\end{minipage}
}
\end{textblock}
